external_games.name: Pika Pika Nurse Monogatari: Shounika ha Itsumo Oosawagi

name: Pika Pika Nurse Monogatari: Shounika ha Itsumo Oosawagi
storyline:
At the pediatrics department of the general hospital, take care of the little ones!

The player becomes a new nurse and works in the pediatric ward in the general hospital. At the hospital, we are entrusted with various tasks, from dealing with outpatients to nursing inpatients and newborns.

Join forces with reliable doctors and senior nurses to help patients in need of illness or injury.
summary: The player becomes a new nurse and works in the pediatric ward in the general hospital. At the hospital, we are entrusted with various tasks, from dealing with outpatients to nursing inpatients and newborns.
